ValidationRule.description: NICC-032393 - The Severity field on the case can only be decreased during an update operation, and not increased.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"Case Integration Customers"), $User.IsActive, ISCHANGED(Severity__c), VALUE(Text(PRIORVALUE(Severity__c))) > VALUE(Text(Severity__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Severity cannot be increased by the API, please contact Amadeus Global Escalation Support.
